title: Provision a Static Route
description: A customer needs a static route added to the network to reach a private resource.

tasks.description: Get the destination network and next-hop IP address from the service request.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the required routing parameters.

tasks.description: Apply the static route configuration to the appropriate edge router.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the static route.

tasks.description: Verify the route is present in the router's routing table.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent checks the routing table and confirms the new route is active.
